Detailed Description

CameraWidget:

The internals of the CameraWidget are only visible to gphoto2. You can only access them using the functions provided by gphoto2.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
  • libgphoto2/gphoto2-widget.c
Generated on Sun May 20 23:03:42 2007 for libgphoto2 photo camera library (libgphoto2) by  1.5.0
